FAQs

    Getting Started with PBCore

    • How do I get started with PBCore?

      lorem ipsum blah blah blah

    • What is an asset? What is an instantitaion? What's the difference?

      An asset is a lorem ipsum. An instantiation is an area tempor labore et up

    • What is an element vs. an attribute?

      Elements are data and attributes qualify that data.

    • What are container elements?

      Container elements do not directly enclose data, but rather wrap around other elements holding data to group them together.
